title: Is video conferencing really a green alternative to travel the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: The benefits of video conferencing in businesses are very wide. From cutting travel expenses to saving time and resources, videoconferencing allows companies to efficiently manage business communication systems in order to achieve the strategic benefits of higher productivity and improved business processes. The most important advantages: Easy access.Time-saving.Cost-effectiveness.Increased attendance.Sharing of information.The decrease in personal contact.Thanks to videoconferences, company assets could meet whenever and wherever they are, thus speeding up necessary responses, key decisions and ultimately the entire business process as a result of more frequent and faster communication. And, let us not forget the all-important client relations that can be greatly improved. By choosing videoconference over faceless old school conference calls your business relationships can take to all-new levels. Unlike teleconferences, videoconferences are visual, and there lies the rub. It removes communication barriers, allowing meeting participants to see facial expressions and body language. An online videoconference is also a powerful tool in elevating capacities within organisations by collaborating with experts from across the globe in training company staff and sharing with them ideas and information.

As the planet has reached different levels of pollution , video conferencing is a breath of fresh air as it doesn’t require gas emission in order to serve its purpose. Professionals use travel as means to meeting with their counterparts in their business/work en devours , travelling is done by different means and most of them involve burning some kind of energy which increases the level of pollution. Meanwhile video conferencing only requires setting up and two or more people can engage in what ever activity they need to in order to accomplish whatever goals they set.
